data.text:
@EU_Commission @lexhoogduin Huh?
EU.......Daar zouden we toch de stekker uit trekken.....
@EU_Commission You idiots must think the people of the eu are stupid It's without doubt the other way round. You're idiotic propaganda isn't going to work !
@EU_Commission chocolate eaters are slaves and child labor makers
@EU_Commission @Transport_EU @EBrivioEU @Bulc_EU Of course with the entire EU at the same latitude this is perfect for a supranational decision...
@EU_Commission @Transport_EU @EBrivioEU @Bulc_EU Vous n’avez que ça à foutre ?
@EU_Commission @Transport_EU @EBrivioEU @Bulc_EU Perhaps using Google Forms? Facebook, Twitter poll?
@EU_Commission @Transport_EU @EBrivioEU @Bulc_EU Almost as if night-time by 5 or 6pm was unhealthy
@EU_Commission I also want a pulic consultation on the remaining in the euro-mark area....

@EU_Commission @Transport_EU @EBrivioEU @Bulc_EU The U.S. most definitely needs to do something similar! I know California is going to do something similar in November via referendum, but Congress apparently would still need to approve it if it wins; there are only 2 states that don't have daylight savings, AZ & HI.

@EU_Commission @Transport_EU @EBrivioEU @Bulc_EU The link takes me to Daily News (shudder). In the meantime, please let's NOT put the clocks back in October and remain (oops!) on UTC+1 all year round.
@EU_Commission biggest mistake was to allow the Eastern block countries in, also have apolitical union. Thy would have been better off remain as #EEC trading area only. The EU would remain strong
@EU_Commission @Transport_EU @EBrivioEU @Bulc_EU Please give every EU citizen a unique ID for surveys like this. Thank you!
@EU_Commission @Transport_EU @EBrivioEU @Bulc_EU Please end moving clocks and please fix that broken survey, thanks!
@EU_Commission @Transport_EU @EBrivioEU @Bulc_EU The survey has been down all day, not exactly available in all languages....

@EU_Commission 
how can we answer the questionnaire if the server is always inaccessible? #SummerTime
@EU_Commission @Transport_EU @EBrivioEU @Bulc_EU Preferisco l'ora solare
@EU_Commission @Transport_EU @EBrivioEU @Bulc_EU Si ma solo dal solstizio d'estate all'equinozio d'autunno. 5 mesi sono troppi!

@EU_Commission @Europarl_EN @Avramopoulos @JKingEU @EUHomeAffairs ....but will do nothing to protect us from invasive migration, who will continue their tactics of "sweet spot" followed/supported by "humanitarian" propaganda....
@EU_Commission @Transport_EU @EBrivioEU @Bulc_EU let's get rid of this!
@EU_Commission @Transport_EU @EBrivioEU @Bulc_EU Unavailable when l tried.

@EU_Commission @Transport_EU @EBrivioEU @Bulc_EU The extra hour of daylight is good for me (I’d say even better from a general health). Going back to shorter daylight is definitely not good and the transition can be troublesome for a few days. So, like most, I would vote for DST all year
@EU_Commission @FedericaMog @JHahnEU @eu_eeas @eu_near development measures need to be implemented in Africa to stop these massive immigration and their traffickers

@EU_Commission @Transport_EU @EBrivioEU @Bulc_EU Instead of changing the clocks just change the business hours every 6 months for those that this really matters. The rest of us can live life like normal.

@EU_Commission @MddMacron @Trade_EU @MalmstromEU @danielrosarioEU Yes, this is sad and meaningless. Our state of Washington depends on trade. Our wheat farmers will suffer. So will our apple farmers. And Boeing.
@EU_Commission @Transport_EU @EBrivioEU @Bulc_EU Eliminating the daylight saving time is a no-brainer. It makes no sense in the digital age and it makes citizens depressed for 6 months.
@EU_Commission @Trade_EU @MalmstromEU @danielrosarioEU Well done.
@EU_Commission @teijalarikka @Transport_EU @EBrivioEU @Bulc_EU @NadjaFK @Rangersnomore @VesaTervo @fermor1 It's been 24 hours and you still have not fixed your servers. That's embarrassingly slow.

@EU_Commission @Transport_EU @EBrivioEU @Bulc_EU So much money is poured into the EU machinery and you can't even keep a polling web app up and running?!? What happened? Did you suddenly realise you forgot to implement GDPR features? :D :D
@EU_Commission @Moedas @JunckerEU @sebastiankurz @EUCouncil I don’t want to be on any bridge with FPO people
@EU_Commission @FedericaMog @JHahnEU @eu_eeas @eu_near Zullen wij wel betalen
@EU_Commission @Transport_EU @EBrivioEU @Bulc_EU Le questionnaire est indisponible. Restons à l’heure d’été c’est tellement plus agréable.

@EU_Commission @FedericaMog @JHahnEU @eu_eeas @eu_near Are you now indirectly paying economic migrants to stay put with European Nations taxes ?
Disgraceful, the EU policy caused the mess!

@EU_Commission @teijalarikka @Transport_EU @EBrivioEU @Bulc_EU @NadjaFK @Rangersnomore @fermor1 @EU_Commission Did you get too many results that you didn't like or is the survey censored? I and my fellow Finns hate the daylight saving time. Prepare for a lot of answers.

@EU_Commission @MalmstromEU @Trade_EU @danielrosarioEU Understandable, but sad to see it come to this. At least the TRQ is structured to permit some supply adjustment if I read the release correctly (ie, trade volumes can expand a bit beyond the historical levels before the tariff hikes kick in). Right?

@EU_Commission @FedericaMog @JHahnEU @eu_eeas @eu_near It's your open border policy which caused the problem in the first place and now you are trying to close the stable door after the horse has bolted.
@EU_Commission Manuel Valls says that Europe has to be of the Nations I think it should be of the Regions #Merkel @EmmanuelMacron
@EU_Commission @Transport_EU @EBrivioEU @Bulc_EU Yes, but leave the summer time!
@EU_Commission @Europarl_EN @Avramopoulos @JKingEU @EUHomeAffairs Et ceux qui ont pris un aller simple ?
@EU_Commission @Transport_EU @EBrivioEU @Bulc_EU Server still down... can't vote! Anyway if no time changes, just keep the summer time all year, keeping winter time is silly.
@EU_Commission @Transport_EU @EBrivioEU @Bulc_EU It's about time to give up this relic from the past! Let's just hope the citizens are smart enough to adopt for a change, too

@EU_Commission @Lomquiche @Transport_EU @EBrivioEU @Bulc_EU That web form is atrocious on a mobile phone. Can not complete due to the "wait animation".

Summer time always. End winter.

@EU_Commission Yet that won’t stop them hetting round the continent in Co2 spewing planes, and V8 engine cars! All funded of course, by the nations this institution leeches off like mafia bosses wannabes! 

Insidious Institution
@EU_Commission @teijalarikka @Transport_EU @EBrivioEU @Bulc_EU @NadjaFK @Rangersnomore @VesaTervo @fermor1 Like everything in EU....EU is THE technical problem
@EU_Commission @Transport_EU @EBrivioEU @Bulc_EU surveys are great and I would love to participate on a regular basis...IF it would work :-(
@EU_Commission @JunckerEU @sebastiankurz @EUCouncil Its known that Austrian immigrants turned out good carpenters. But first they tuck in a lot of beer, pretzels & smoke pipe.
@EU_Commission AzzazzzazazazazzzzzzzzzeeeeèzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzZzzaz
@EU_Commission @Transport_EU @EBrivioEU @Bulc_EU Keep clocks on DST time, not the other way. I mean just DST all year long.
@EU_Commission @Transport_EU @EBrivioEU @Bulc_EU I've been trying to reach the survey since 22.00 last night and it's STILL down?!
@EU_Commission Help! Dzień dobry, jakaś nieznana mi osoba wykorzystuje moje dane osobowe. Gdzie mogę uda się po pomoc, żeby sprawca został ukarany?
@EU_Commission @JunckerEU @sebastiankurz @EUCouncil Hope there will be more bridges than dealmaking. One dealmaker is enough!!
@EU_Commission @JunckerEU @sebastiankurz @EUCouncil "This means nothing to me" 🎶
@EU_Commission what happened to the Summertime vs Wintertime survey? Friday noon and still not available !?
@EU_Commission @JunckerEU @sebastiankurz @EUCouncil Hopefully!
@EU_Commission @Transport_EU @EBrivioEU @Bulc_EU Survey not working. DST (summer) time all year long would be great, though.
@EU_Commission @Rajadas @Transport_EU @EBrivioEU @Bulc_EU If only the link was working...

@EU_Commission @Transport_EU @EBrivioEU @Bulc_EU You shouldn't have technical issues with a server running a simple survey, no matter how many people are accessing it. Maybe @acens can provide something more robust that actually scales ;)

@EU_Commission @Transport_EU @EBrivioEU @Bulc_EU @EU_Commission @Transport_EU @EBrivioEU @Bulc_EU Since the survey is down, I'll leave my opinion. I would stop time change, but I would keep only summertime. (Unfortunately I think that is not any of the options....
@EU_Commission @Transport_EU @EBrivioEU @Bulc_EU When will your survey server be accessable again for this questionnaire? Since yesterday afternoon I had no success in reaching it.
@EU_Commission @Transport_EU @EBrivioEU @Bulc_EU Aizpildam aptauju/balsošanu.
@EU_Commission @Transport_EU @EBrivioEU @Bulc_EU The form only gives an error!?
@EU_Commission @Transport_EU @EBrivioEU @Bulc_EU I can't load the page but I will answer anyway:  summer time as regular  for Poland please!! No more stupid change twice a year!
@EU_Commission @Transport_EU @EBrivioEU @Bulc_EU EBeko hizkuntza guztietan? :P
@EU_Commission @Transport_EU @EBrivioEU @Bulc_EU Did the server ever work? Badly prepared for a survey, I'd say. 🤨
@EU_Commission Umfrage Sommerzeit seit Tagen Server überlastet... bitte aufstocken
@EU_Commission @Transport_EU @EBrivioEU @Bulc_EU Server is still down :(
@EU_Commission @Transport_EU @EBrivioEU @Bulc_EU The questionnaire link is not working
@EU_Commission @FuzzyLeapfrog @Transport_EU @EBrivioEU @Bulc_EU Danke für den Link. Aber: "The EUROPA server is temporarily unavailable"
@EU_Commission @Transport_EU @EBrivioEU @Bulc_EU The server hosting the consultation is down since yesterday...
@EU_Commission @Transport_EU @EBrivioEU @Bulc_EU Lads lads, fix your server, I want to take part in European Democracy!😎
@EU_Commission @Transport_EU @EBrivioEU @Bulc_EU Another Euro-waste of time. The survey does not work in 2 dozen languages! How much are EU citizens paying for this joke?
@EU_Commission @Transport_EU @EBrivioEU @Bulc_EU España (península, Baleares y territorios africanos) debería de tener la misma hora que Portugal.
@EU_Commission @NotArpit @_Nickelfront @DontStopBliefin that's one way to quash fake news
@EU_Commission Every torture is an international crime i am being tortured In India Responsible Indian prime minister, Maharashtra chief minister. Jesus Christ will punish. Pune  country India

@EU_Commission Kindly ask Nigerian President why his government have refused to stop unnecessary killings going on in Nigeria since 1st January 2018, no arrest have been made just because the murderous Fulani herdsmen are President Buhari's tribesmen.
@EU_Commission @_Nickelfront @grande1899
@EU_Commission Come on liars, everyone knows the truth except for the stupid politicians paid by financial lobbies. Close every single inch of borders, that's the future.
@EU_Commission @Transport_EU @EBrivioEU @Bulc_EU The summer time is best for Bulgaria and EU!We must stay in summer time...That's is my opinion! #SummerTime
@EU_Commission @Transport_EU @EBrivioEU @Bulc_EU Does the fact the survey website is currently down mean that lots of people are having their say?
@EU_Commission please i want the commission to investigate & persecute my President M.Buhari for Genocides crimes against the Nigerian citizens. Thanks

@EU_Commission @PaulbernalUK What about derivative work? you realize that Youtube's crappy content filter is always broken? Similarities, copyright trolls etc - anyone who tried doing any remixes/reviews would tell you that. Not to mention spurious claims which take weeks to fight and result in lost revenue.
@EU_Commission @Transport_EU @EBrivioEU @Bulc_EU Daylight saving is to use the daylight as much as possible to use electric power more efficiently. Therefore no idea why this has been discussed now.
@EU_Commission Not long before you only have to issue Tweets in English just for those expats in Europe or those in Ireland yet to learn to use Irish Gaelic. There is a Brexit saving for you.
@EU_Commission @Transport_EU @EBrivioEU @Bulc_EU The server is broken, can't vote!
@EU_Commission @mariannethyssen @EU_Social @jb_bax About 15.000 per company. Can you remind us please the MONTHLY salary of the politicians in European and National Parliaments?
@EU_Commission @Glic16 @Transport_EU @EBrivioEU @Bulc_EU Change day to night. It will confuse The Kremlin.
@EU_Commission Tell us how much money you spend with the European Globalisation Adjustment Fund (EGF) and what percentage of the people in these programmes found a PERMANENT job
@EU_Commission @jyrkikatainen @CorinaCretuEU #Biodiversity loss is much greater problem! The main focus of the greener eu should be connected to that issue, not to the clim. change!
@EU_Commission @Transport_EU @EBrivioEU @Bulc_EU Goita @QuimMonzo.
@EU_Commission @Transport_EU @EBrivioEU @Bulc_EU Can we still fill it in in the UK? #brexit 😢

@EU_Commission @PaulbernalUK a parody exception would not work for AI filter based on Logarithms, the so called uploadfilter. Therefore it would of course ban memes. Simply because of the fact that it has no humor. Who you trying to fool here😒...
@EU_Commission @Transport_EU @EBrivioEU @Bulc_EU Seems to have hit a nerve.  Server is down

@EU_Commission @PaulbernalUK Whilst there is a possibility for MS to introduce a parody exception, its scope varies in the EU territory. Also, parodies require an appreciation of context which algorithms are unable to do at present. Happy to provide evidence of this.

@EU_Commission And yet that wasn’t how the directive read - and how any likely implementation could work - which is one of the main reasons it was rejected by the Parliament. Could you work a bit more closely with civil society and academia next time please?
@EU_Commission @Transport_EU @EBrivioEU @Bulc_EU The server isn't working

@EU_Commission @GattAllan Either you're a well-groomed muppet, or this is your first job after finishing uni. The gif you posted is copyrighted material, and would be taken down if the directive was implemented. If you create precedence for that, we can kiss goodbye to free speech.
@EU_Commission @Transport_EU @EBrivioEU @Bulc_EU Your server doesn’t work.
